title: The Bigger the Scale, the More I Like It
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Thank you very much for letting me practice with you today, Nico-san. I learned a lot from it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You were able to follow me quite well, Setsuna. It’s no small feat to be able to keep up with this Nico, the number one idol in the universe<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>In the universe…. The world that Nico-san lives in....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Actually, after you told me I could practice with you, I read a novel that was set in space, Nico-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I-, I see….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I wanted to understand even a little bit of this world that you stand on top of. But as I read on, the feeling of working towards your goals with a passionate conviction while facing loneliness from the vast endless space struck me so much that I couldn’t sleep….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Wait a minute. Nico isn’t really like that, you know<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Nico-san! I…. I love the you that stands for this universe….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Listen to me! I won’t let you go home until we clear your misunderstanding, okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
